sources.title: DITO Telecom surges with 50% revenue growth in 2024 - Inquirer Business
Philippine telecom market analysis Q2 2024 - Mordor Intelligence
DITO social media engagement outperforms competitors - Social Media Today
Brand sentiment analysis: Philippine telecoms June 2024 - YouGov
DITO Independence Day campaign reaches 15K mentions - Rappler Tech

insights: DITO's Share of Voice increased to 21.7%, up 7% from previous quarter
Social mentions reached 15,423, representing 45% growth month-over-month
Engagement rate of 116.95% exceeds telecom industry average by 41.8x
Positive sentiment at 86.7% outperforms Globe (72%) and Smart (68%)
ROI of 6.6% surpasses industry benchmark of 3.8% by 74%
